snippet: The new rule applies to about 150,000 children in city-licensed day cares and preschools, covering those from 6 months to 5 years of age.
abstract: New York City requires flu vaccine for children in city-licensed day cares and preschool.
lead_paragraph: The new rule applies to about 150,000 children in city-licensed day cares and preschools, covering those from 6 months to 5 years of age.

headline.main: New York City Requiring Flu Shots for Preschoolers
headline.print_headline: New York City Requiring Flu Shots for Preschoolers
